law.catch_line: Jurisdiction of administration of intestate's estate.
law.text: When a person dies intestate, the District Court which would have had jurisdiction to probate his will, had he made a will, shall have jurisdiction to grant administration on his estate.
law.history: Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 383, effective January 2, 1978. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 3894.
